tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NN Peace)) (VP (VBZ is) (RB not) (NP (NP (NP (DT the) (NN absence)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN affliction)))) (, ,) (CC but) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN presence)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NNP God)))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [absence/NN nsubj>Peace/NN cop>is/VBZ neg>not/RB det>the/DT nmod:of>[affliction/NN case>of/IN] punct>,/, cc>but/CC conj:but>[presence/NN det>the/DT nmod:of>[God/NNP case>of/IN]] punct>./.]
